attributes.action: To Keep Jamie Oliver Away From School Dinners For Ever
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it is up setting to sse one man namely Jamie oliver use a subject like childrens welfare to get into the news to promote his flagging carreer.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
